Metadata.title: Aitemu - Open-Source Collection Management Tool
Metadata.description: Aitemu is an open-source collection management tool that allows users to create and curate personalized collections of books, marks, and more. Enjoy full-text search, engage with others through likes and comments, and easily share your collections with the world. Join our open-source community and revolutionize the way you manage and showcase your treasures.
Metadata.keywords: Collection management, Open-source, Personalized collections, Full-text search, Like and comment, Share collections, Organization tool, Curation, Bookshelf, Mark collection
Metadata.author: Saidafzal Kholkhujaev
